A city made entirely of mirrors that reflects the surrounding landscape, creating an illusion of depth andess.
A city that exists only in the digital realm, accessible only through virtual reality headsets.
A city built underground, with a labyrinthine network of tunnels and caverns that the inhabitants never see the sun.
A city where every building is made of a translucent material that allows people to see through it, creating a sense of openness and transparency.
A city that is constantly in motion, with buildings and streets that are constantly shifting and changing, creating a sense of instability and uncertainty.
